item.title: Hunter (Level 6)
item.description: Used git bisect to perform a binary search to find which change introduced a bug.

item.title: Hunter (Level 5)
item.description: Used git bisect to perform a binary search to find which change introduced a bug.

item.title: Hunter (Level 4)
item.description: Used git bisect to perform a binary search to find which change introduced a bug.

item.title: Inventor (blameall)
item.description: Used a command that isn't part of the built in Git command

item.title: Apprentice Tree Trimmer (Level 3)
item.description: Rewrite branches with git filter-branch

item.title: Master Pilgrim (Level -inf)
item.description: Performed a rebase using git rebase --onto.

item.title: Apprentice Hunter (Level 3)
item.description: Used git bisect to perform a binary search to find which change introduced a bug.

item.title: Homeowner
item.description: Set global email address using git config.

item.title: Master Goldsmith (Level -inf)
item.description: Reviewed patches before committing with git diff --cached.

item.title: Baptised
item.description: Set global user name using git config.

item.title: Chimney Sweeper (Level 4)
item.description: Used git gc to run a number of housekeeping tasks on the current repository.

item.title: Apprentice Plumber (Level 2)
item.description: Use the internal plumbing commands of git.

item.title: Master Socialite (Level 11)
item.description: pushed a branch to a remote repository using git push

item.title: Librarian
item.description: Looked for change that introduce or remove a string with git log -S

item.title: Master Investigator (Level 8)
item.description: Used git blame to annotate a file with information about how each line changed.

item.title: Archivist (Level 4)
item.description: Prepare each commit with its patch in one file per commit with git format-patch

item.title: Merchant (Level 5)
item.description: Added an external repository with git remote add.

item.title: Apprentice Cathedral Worker (Level 2)
item.description: Cloned submodule repository and checked out commits specified by superproject.

item.title: Apprentice Cathedral Worker (Level 1)
item.description: Cloned submodule repository and checked out commits specified by superproject.

item.title: Master Author (Level 10)
item.description: Made 2^Level commits using git commit.
